name: Big Gun Fun
description:
Endless hours of fun shooting tin cans with a cannon. Pick one of the tin can configurations and start shooting. There is also a Can Toss mode which is fun and challenging. Have fun shooting and watching the cans flying around on the screen!

+ Multiple Tin Can Configurations
+ Tin Can Toss Mode
+ Shoot Tin Cans Into A Barrel Mode
+ 25, 50, 75 and 100 Tin Can Challenges Mode
+ Fun And Challenging
